Detailed Description

Audio filters.

Enumeration Type Documentation

◆ Coeff

enum xdsp::filter::Coeff

\( H(z) = \frac{a_0x + a_1x\cdot z^{-1} + a_2x\cdot z^{-2}}{1 + b_1y\cdot z^{-1} + b_2y\cdot z^{-2}} \)
\( a_x \): feedforward coefficients.
\( b_x \): feedback coefficients.

In this representation, \( b_0 \) is always normalized to 1!

◆ StateReg

enum xdsp::filter::StateReg

Biquad filter state registers.
(State register naming only directly reflected in DIRECT form biquad.
For other forms, the registers do not strictly correspond to only inputs or outputs.
Canonical forms use only two registers.)

Enumerator
X_Z1 

Input state register 1. (Corresponds to \( x[n-1] \) in DIRECT form.)

X_Z2 

Input state register 2. (Corresponds to \( x[n-2] \) in DIRECT form.)

Y_Z1 

Output state register 1. (Corresponds to \( x[n-1] \) in DIRECT form.)

Y_Z2 

Output state register 2. (Corresponds to \( x[n-2] \) in DIRECT form.)
